original_text: Then the Lord caused the donkey to speak. It said, ‘What have I done to hurt you? Why have you hit me three times like that?’
korean_text: 여호와께서 나귀 입을 여시니 발람에게 이르되 내가 당신에게 무엇을 하였기에 나를 이같이 세 번을 때리느냐

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord caused the donkey to speak
What have I done to hurt you?
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신에게 무엇을 해서 상처를 입혔나요?

sentences.original_text: Why have you hit me three times like that?
sentences.korean_translation: 왜 당신은 나를 그렇게 세 번이나 쳤나요?
